original: Danielson, Nils Teodor, brandchef, Borås, f. 9/11/97 i Kärda, Jönköp. 1., av prosten Nils D. o. Maria Dahlqvist. G. 26 m. Vera Kindgren. Barn: Margit f. 28, Per 33, Anders 36. — Realex. i Växjö 15, avg:ex. v. CTL 17, ma-skining:ex. i Strelitz, Tyskl., 23. Anst. v. Pentaverken i Skövde 18, v. Gbgs Patentbyrå 19, Lidköp. Mek. Verkst. 20, Gbgs brandkår 25-27, Borås brandkår 27, v. brandchef där 35, brand-chef 46. Rev. i Sv. brandbef :förb. sed. 44. Medl. i Odd Fellow. Hobby: metallslöjd. Sv. riksiluftsk :förb. ftjt.
translated: Danielson, Nils Teodor, fire chief, Borås, b. November 9th, 1897 in Kärda, Jönköping County, eldest son of the priest Nils D. and Maria Dahlqvist. Married in 1926 to Vera Kindgren. Children: Margit b. 1928, Per b. 1933, Anders b. 1936. Educated at Växjö Realexamen in 1915, graduated from Central Technical Institute in 1917, studied in Strelitz, Germany in 1923. Employed by Pentaverken in Skövde in 1918, Gbgs Patentbyrå in 1919, Lidköping Mechanical Workshop in 1920, Gothenburg Fire Brigade from 1925 to 1927, Borås Fire Brigade from 1927, and then promoted to deputy chief in 1935 and chief in 1946. Reviewer for the Swedish Fire Fighting Association since 1944. Member of the Odd Fellow society. Hobby: metalwork. Member of the Swedish National Air Defense Association since its inception.
